# **OpNest â€“ Full-Service Digital Agency Today**

Welcome to the **OpNest** project!
This repository contains the full exported code from **Webflow**, including HTML, CSS, JS, images, fonts, and animation assets.

This version is fully editable and can be hosted anywhere (cPanel, Netlify, Vercel, Cloudflare, custom server, etc.).

## ğŸš€ **Project Overview**

This is a complete marketing website for **OpNest â€“ Launch Your Digital Agency Today**, built originally in **Webflow** and exported as static code.

The exported project includes:

* Clean HTML files for each page
* CSS generated by Webflow
* JavaScript for Webflow interactions
* Images, fonts, videos
* Lottie JSON animation files

All visual layouts, animations, and responsive behaviors come directly from the Webflow design.

## ğŸ› ï¸ **How to Work With This Codebase**

Webflow exports static files â€” meaning all layout, CSS classes, and interactions are **baked into HTML + CSS**.
Editing is easy, but you must follow the workflow below.

## âœï¸ **Editing or Modifying Anything (Recommended Workflow)**

Follow this simple 6-step guideline whenever you want to change **text, images, styles, animations, or layout**.

## âœ”ï¸ **1. Visit the website**

Open the live version or open the `.html` file locally.

## âœ”ï¸ **2. Inspect the element you want to change**

Right-click â†’ **Inspect (Chrome DevTools)**.

Identify:

* The exact **CSS class**
* OR the **ID**
* OR the **element tag**

Example:

```html
<h1 class="banner-title white">Start Your Agency Today</h1>
```

Copy the class name:
`banner-title`

## âœ”ï¸ **3. Find the element inside the corresponding `.html` file**

Open:

```
/index.html
/about-us.html
/...etc
```

Search for the class:

```
Ctrl + F â†’ "banner-title"
```

Modify the content:

```html
<h1 class="banner-title white">New Heading</h1>
```

## âœ”ï¸ **4. For styling changes â†’ edit the CSS file**

Webflow generates CSS in:

```
css/shekharjaiwal.webflow.css       â† Main editable stylesheet
```

Search the class:

```
Ctrl + F â†’ ".banner-title"
```

Modify CSS:

```css
.banner-title {
  font-size: 52px;
  color: #ffffff;
}
```

**Never modify `webflow.css`** â€“ it is auto-generated and controls Webflow interactions.

## âœ”ï¸ **5. Save changes and refresh the browser**

Make sure the page reflects your updates.
If using hosting â†’ upload updated files to server.

## âœ”ï¸ **6. Clear browser cache if CSS changes donâ€™t show**

Sometimes Webflow CSS is cached.

Press:

```
Ctrl + Shift + R   â†’ Hard reload
```

# ğŸ¨ **Where to Edit What**

| What you want to change         | Where to edit                                   |
| ------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------- |
| Text / Headings / Buttons       | Inside the `.html` file                         |
| Images                          | Replace files in `/images` and update `src`     |
| Lottie animations               | Replace `.json` inside `/documents`             |
| Styles (colors, spacing, fonts) | `css/shekharjaiwal.webflow.css`                 |
| Interaction timing, animations  | `js/webflow.js` (advanced, not recommended)     |
| Video sources                   | In the `.html` `<video>` tag                    |
| Navbar/Footer items             | Directly in `.html` pages (not reused globally) |

## ğŸ‰ **Thank You for Using OpNest**

This README ensures you can safely edit and maintain your Webflow-exported codebase with confidence.
